title: 4 Bedrooms house for sale in Ekala
details:
4 Bedroom House for Sale in Ekala

- Brand new house
- 2 Floors
- Balcony for 1st Floor rooms
- 4 Bedrooms
- 4 Bathrooms
- Store room
- 12.4 Perches
- 2400 Sqft
- Verandah
- Two living areas
- Dinning
- Kitchen with pantry
- Maids quarters with separate entrance
- 2 car parking spaces
- Three phase electricity
- 24 Hours security
- Lake side view
- Swimming Pool
- Jogging Area
- Waste Management System
- Residential Area

Location;
- 5 mins drive to the colombo - jaela highway
- 5 mins drive to the KFC, Supermarket
- 2 - 3 min drive to Sampath , Seylan, BOC and Peoples Bank.


Price of the property - LKR 20 Million
Price is exclusive of legal fee and stamp duty fee


Inspections with prior appointments

Please get in touch with Mister T on 0768557736 or write to us at marketing@mistert.lk for further details.

Please call during business hours of 9:30 a.m. and 6.30 p.m on weekdays.

Fee & charges apply!
